name: Tholu Bommalata
description: Shadow-puppet theatre using painted leather puppets; stories from Ramayana.

name: Koodiyattam
description: Ancient Sanskrit theatre tradition performed in temples.

name: Yakshagana
description: Folk theatre combining dance, dialogue, and music.

name: Dhrupad
description: Oldest surviving form of Hindustani vocal music, meditative style.

name: Baul Music
description: Mystical folk songs of wandering minstrels, with spiritual philosophy.

name: Chhau Dance
description: A semi-classical dance with martial elements; notable styles include Purulia Chhau.

name: Yakshagana
description: A traditional theatre form combining dance, music, dialogue, and elaborate costumes.
